# Prerequisites to contributing

## Technical

-   Minimum [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) v10, though we do recommend using the latest LTS release.
-   Latest [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/).

## Rules of thumb

1.  Never push directly to `master` (except when updating the CHANGELOG). If you need to change something â€” create PR, even if it's a one letter change.
